{"id":848375470,"question_id":36,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1669175244,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/848375470/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"18.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++){\n            int checkrow[10] = {}, checkcol[10] = {}, checkgrid[10] = {};\n            int basrow = (i / 3) * 3 + 1, bascol = (i % 3) * 3 + 1;\n            for(int j = 0; j < 9; j++){  \n                int dx = j / 3 - 1, dy = j % 3 - 1;\n                if(board[i][j] != '.')checkrow[board[i][j] - '0']++;\n                if(board[j][i] != '.')checkcol[board[j][i] - '0']++;\n                if(board[basrow + dx][bascol + dy] != '.'){\n                    checkgrid[board[basrow + dx][bascol + dy] - '0']++;\n                }\n            }\n            for(int j = 1; j < 10; j++){\n                if(checkrow[j] > 1 || checkcol[j] > 1 || checkgrid[j] > 1) return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
